title: Eak rishta Benam sa..
description: "Eak rishta benam sa.." is not a love story. It shows the problems of a stammerer and how does the lead character overcome from his habbit. This book also contains the pshychology of youth and romance.It is specifically a story which contains romance, friendship and ofcourse social issues.http://www.amazon.in/Eak-Rishta-Benam...
author: Bhagwant Anmol
